name: Oway
headline: Ridesharing freight with ML to cut pallet shipping costs by 50%
description:
Oway is a rideshare freight platform that uses machine learning to automatically coordinate and sell unused space in trucks to SMBs at a 50% discount for lightning-fast shipping. 

Every year, nearly 50% all truck space goes unused annually in the almost $1T US trucking industry. On the other hand, SMBs represent 44% of the US GDP and are historically forced to deal with high freight rates and friction due to their small size compared to enterprise businesses. 

With trucking being a hyper-fragmented market (90%+ of US trucking companies are small family businesses), we decided to build an ecosystem that takes all of this inefficiency and turns it into something that could fundamentally transform the livelihoods of businesses and drivers alike.

Oway is designed to be simple (you can place an order in 30 seconds) and scale with your business. Our ML rideshare protocol now allows businesses to ship freight affordably and faster than ever before. We also improve the survivability of independent truckers by maximizing their revenue when they‚Äôre already on the road - and it‚Äôs great for the environment too. üçÉ
tags: industry:machine-learning; industry:marketplace; industry:b2b; industry:ridesharing; industry:logistics; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Phillip Nadjafov, Founder
founders.description:
Founder of Oway, an ML-based online rideshare platform that makes small-batch freight shipping affordable for everyone. 

Self-taught engineer and occasional car designer.

Almost all trucks drive around with empty space, why not use it?
Oway is a freight shipping platform that lets you ship using live empty truck space for your small pallet shipments, by giving "pitstops" to carriers that have additional capacity while they're on the road.
It's more affordable, faster, and less prone to damage than traditional LTL. Try it today to see and ship on the Oway network.
Almost all trucks drive around with empty space, why not use it?
Oway is a freight shipping platform that lets you ship using live empty truck space for your small pallet shipments, by giving "pitstops" to carriers that have additional capacity while they're on the road.
It's more affordable, faster, and less prone to damage than traditional LTL. Try it today to see and ship on the Oway network.
Almost all trucks in the United States drive around partially empty, why not use it?
Oway lets you ship using live empty truck space for your small pallet shipments, adding quick "pitstops" to carriers that are going along the same route as your shipment.
It's more affordable, faster, and less prone to damage than traditional LTL. Try it today to see and ship with the future on the Oway network.

Insurance Included + Satisfaction Guarantee
$100K insurance included in all pricing, as well as full refunds if something goes wrong.
#### No Extra Markups or Hidden Fees.
Our mission is to eliminate back-charges and excess fees. With every order, liftgates and insurance are automatically included in pricing.
All Oway drivers are equipped with a baseline of $100K cargo insurance. We'll also help you process any claims.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/acs7T8hdoYmR0ttJEnmM9WJuvJM.svg)

Frequently Asked Questions
### Oway's Rideshare Network: Your Questions Answered
###### [Login or Create an Account ‚Üí](https://www.shipoway.com/<https:/web.oway.io/oauth2/authorization/oway-customer>)
Getting started with Oway?
Oway is a completely new protocol the freight industry. All of our drivers are always on the move. When you place an order, a driver simply reroutes for a few minutes from their usual deliveries to grab your shipment. So once it's picked up, you can expect it to get to your destination on the same route it was picked up on. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZNfQpRJ6ur8k4JHo6mguFLy4t7s.svg)

Frequently Asked Questions
### Oway's Rideshare Network: Your Questions Answered
###### Login or Create an Account ‚Üí‚ü®13‚ü©
Getting started with Oway?
Oway is a completely new protocol the freight industry. All of our drivers are always on the move. When you place an order, a driver simply reroutes for a few minutes from their usual deliveries to grab your shipment. So once it's picked up, you can expect it to get to your destination on the same route it was picked up on. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ZNfQpRJ6ur8k4JHo6mguFLy4t7s.svg)

generated_description:
### Overview of Oway

**Company Name:** Oway  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 12 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S24  
**Website:** [shipoway.com](https://www.shipoway.com)

#### Mission

Oway is on a mission to revolutionize the freight shipping industry through machine learning, specifically aiming to reduce pallet shipping costs by **50%**. The platform is designed to make rideshare freight both fast and affordable, primarily targeting small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) that often struggle with high freight rates.

#### The Problem & Solution

The trucking industry in the U.S. is a massive $1 trillion market, yet astonishingly, nearly **50% of truck space goes unused** every year. Meanwhile, SMBs‚Äîaccounting for **44% of the U.S. GDP**‚Äîface disproportionate challenges due to higher freight costs compared to their larger counterparts. Oway addresses these inefficiencies by creating an ecosystem that connects carriers with available truck space and SMBs needing to ship freight. By facilitating the coordination of unused truck capacities through an intuitive platform, Oway not only benefits businesses but also increases the earnings of independent truckers.

#### Features

- **Lightning-Fast Order Process**: Users can place an order in just **30 seconds**.
- **Cost-Effective Freight Shipping**: Shipments can be made at a **50% discount** compared to traditional freight rates.
- **Rapid Pickups**: The platform enables pickups within **one hour**.
- **Fully Automated Processes**: Oway automates paperwork, signatures, and scheduling to simplify the shipping experience. 
- **Safety and Satisfaction**: All shipments come with **$100K insurance** coverage, and Oway offers full refunds if any issues arise during shipping.

#### Ecosystem Benefits

Oway is not merely a shipping service; it's a transformational platform designed to:
- Enhance the **livelihoods of drivers and businesses** by increasing truck utilization.
- Benefit the **environment** by reducing unnecessary road usage.
- Create a seamless experience for SMBs by eliminating friction in freight processes.

#### Growth Prospects

With a scalable model tailored for rapid adoption, Oway is poised to tap into the hyper-fragmented U.S. trucking market, where over **90% of trucking companies are lesser-known family-owned businesses**. Their efficient use of machine learning not only enhances operational capabilities but offers sustainability by addressing the surplus capacity in freight logistics.

---

In a nutshell, Oway is pushing the boundaries of the freight industry by making shipping faster, cheaper, and smarter, ultimately driving down costs and maximizing utility‚Äîfor both carriers and clients alike. If you're in the market for innovative logistics solutions, it might just be time to check out their offerings.
